Title:
Hapalocystis occidentalis - a new species of Diaporthales
from North America and a key to the species of Hapalocystis
Abstract:
Hapalocystis occidentalis W.M. Jaklitsch & H. Voglmayr
is described as a new species in the Diaporthales based on morphological
observations and phylogenetic analyses of partial nuclear large subunit
ribosomal DNA sequences. A key to the six species recognised in the
genus Hapalocystis Auersw. ex Fuckel is presented.
